mapper.select: SELECT BOOKNO,TITLE,AURTHOR,TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGDATE,KEYWORD,DELFLAG FROM MYTOURBOOK WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{title} ||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTOURBOOK (BOOKNO, TITLE, AURTHOR, REGDATE, KEYWORD, DELFLAG) VALUES(BOOKNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{aurthor}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{keyword}, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE MYTOURBOOK SET DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE BOOKNO=#{bookNo}
